mapper.select: SELECT ab_id abId , ab_name abName , ab_email abEmail , ab_tel abTel , ab_comdept abComdept , ab_birth abBirth , ab_memo abMemo from addrbook
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO addrbook (ab_name, ab_email, ab_comdept, ab_birth, ab_tel, ab_memo) VALUES (#{abName}, #{abEmail}, #{abComdept}, #{abBirth}, #{abTel}, #{abMemo})
mapper.select: SELECT ab_id abId , ab_name abName , ab_email abEmail , ab_tel abTel , ab_comdept abComdept , ab_birth abBirth , ab_memo abMemo FROM addrbook WHERE ab_id = #{abId}
